address: Xã Đức Hạnh, Huyện Đức Linh, Tỉnh Bình Thuận
thought:
**Identifying the New Administrative Unit for the Old Address**

Okay, so I've got this old address: "Xã Đức Hạnh, Huyện Đức Linh, Tỉnh Bình Thuận". My task is to figure out the new ward for it. First, I need to check if the province has merged. I remember seeing something about Bình Thuận, so I quickly look into the resolutions concerning province mergers. Aha! Resolution 60-NQ/TW states that Bình Thuận merged with Lâm Đồng and Đắk Nông to form Lâm Đồng. Excellent.

Now that I know that, I'll identify the relevant ward and district: "Xã Đức Hạnh, Huyện Đức Linh". I start digging through the resolutions, focusing on Lâm Đồng, because that's where Bình Thuận is now. I scan through resolution 1657, 1662 and 1665, but those are Cao Bằng, Đồng Nai and Hà Tĩnh respectively, so they are out. I arrive at resolution 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15, the one related to Lâm Đồng. Bingo.

In this resolution, there's a couple of interesting entries. Entry 74 mentions "xã Đức Linh" which lines up with the old address, but is not the same as the "Xã Đức Hạnh". However, Entry 75 is the golden ticket! This entry states that "xã Đức Hạnh" has been merged into "xã Hoài Đức". It also mentions "thị trấn Đức Tài, xã Đức Tín", which seems like it can be the same. That's a strong lead! Entry 76 is a confirmation that Đức Linh is part of Lâm Đồng, since it mentions "huyện Đức Linh" (from the old address) is part of a merge.

Finally, I confirm this by looking at the "New wards" list for "Xã Hoài Đức" in "Tỉnh Lâm Đồng". And there it is: `{"ward_code":"23194","ward_name":"Xã Hoài Đức","province_name":"Tỉnh Lâm Đồng"}`. That's it! I've found the new administrative unit for the old address. So, "Xã Đức Hạnh, Huyện Đức Linh, Tỉnh Bình Thuận" is now part of "Xã Hoài Đức, Tỉnh Lâm Đồng."

citation.header: 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lâm Đồng
citation.line: 75. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Đức Tài, xã Đức Tín và xã Đức Hạnh thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Hoài Đức.
